author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Upon gold's stead, as the Fed's word is bided,
As goat’s gazes upon the high mead, riveted.
A riddle lies in clues, futures divided,
Await the morrow, secrets enlivened.

A snail's trail upon the leaf of green,
Euro's strength wilted, beneath one point oh seven-seven.
Rabbit caught in a trap, a scene unseen,
Two dawn sessions yet, the path to heaven.

Brent the hare leaps o’er the barrel,
Above the ninety-five mark, carried by the gale.
In Saudi’s words, a potential quarrel,
Dog anticipates the sustain'd cut, told in the tale.

feedItems.title: Gold Steady as Fed Meeting Awaited
feedItems.description: Gold prices were steady as investors awaited the conclusion of the Fed’s meeting Wednesday, which will be scrutinized for any forward-looking clues.

feedItems.title: EUR/USD's Bias Remains Bearish Below 1.0770, Charts Show
feedItems.description: EUR/USD’s bias remains bearish below a recent high of 1.0770, based on technical charts, and although the pair found support around the May low and has rebounded over the past two sessions, it is still within a clear downtrend on the daily chart.

feedItems.title: Brent Briefly Rises Above $95 Following Saudi Energy Minister Comments
feedItems.description: Oil prices briefly rose above $95 a barrel after Saudi Arabia’s energy minister said the “jury is still out” on demand from China, interpreted as an indication the kingdom anticipates leaving its supply cut in place into next year, ANZ said.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of Kingfisher's fiscal gleam now dimmed in light,
In Polish sales, found weaker in their bite.
Pretax gains of pounds, five-ninety mil,
Th' consensus missed, a bitter brew to swill.

In Russian lands, they craft their drones of war,
Low-cost, explosive, tread on Ukraine's shore.
Once Kyiv led, in tactics neat and shrewd,
But Moscovites now mirror, in frenzied mood.

El Niño wakes, Australia raises voice,
Declaring dry and fiery days by choice.
Rainfall ebbs, whilst heat waves do assert,
A pattern grim, the farmer's field to hurt.

feedItems.title: Kingfisher Cuts Full-Year Guidance
feedItems.description: Kingfisher now sees its adjusted pretax profit for fiscal 2024 at £590 million, after first-half profits missed consensus, driven largely by a weaker sales performance in Poland.

feedItems.title: How Russia Is Building Up Its Arsenal of Low-Cost Explosive Drones
feedItems.description: Early in its invasion of Ukraine, Russia lagged behind Kyiv in its use of low-cost explosive drones. But by mid 2023, Russian UAVs were targeting Ukrainian forces, copying some of Kyiv’s most successful tactics. WSJ explains how Moscow is catching up.

feedItems.title: Australia Declares El Niño Underway, Warns of Reduced Rainfall
feedItems.description: Australia said an El Niño weather pattern is under way, bringing with it a heightened risk of wildfires, heat waves and reduced rainfall to one of the world’s largest exporters of agricultural products.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
In the great halls of Kingfisher, whispers drift on the sea-breeze,
Their doom-predictions keenly watched, stock value to appease.
The wrath of Citi's neutral glare, alterations in sight,
In the fierce storm of commerce, lowly Neid-fire's light.

Ocado, like Fenrir, races 'gainst time, in glory and strife,
Unchanged stands its year-end goal, on the edge of Skofnung's knife.
Rising the tide of revenue, by Thor's might, it increases,
Into the final quarter slides, where the rough turmoil ceases.

To the hot sands of Arabia, where camels doth make their rest,
Tesla courts the desert king, in a crucial test.
Early are their whispered talks, under the blazing Sunna's stare,
A storm of steel and lightning may soon rise in the desert's glare.

feedItems.title: Kingfisher's Comments on Regional Performance Will Be Keenly Watched
feedItems.description: Kingfisher could see consensus estimates lowered 5%-6% on the back of its guidance cut, Citi said, keeping a neutral rating on the stock and a 256p price target.

feedItems.title: Ocado Keeps Outlook As Sales Rise
feedItems.description: Ocado left its full-year guidance unchanged on positive momentum heading into the final quarter after it reported a 7.2% rise in third-quarter revenue.

feedItems.title: Saudi Arabia is in early-stage talks with Tesla about setting up a manufacturing facility there, people familiar with the discussions said.
feedItems.description: Saudi Arabia is in early-stage talks with Tesla about setting up a manufacturing facility there, people familiar with the discussions said.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In realms of governance, great surge we see,
Three hundred thousand posts, fullfilled and free.
The Bureau notes this stir, a noble deed,
A fifth of all new roles - the public's need.

Once humble venture, now with price so dear,
Instacart at $30 makes its premier.
Resurgence whispers in the market's ear,
In IPO's garden, flowers reappear.

From Iran's confining grasp, the captives break,
Five American souls a journey make. 
For energy's rich boon had been their stake,
Now, towards their homeland's hearth, a path they take.

feedItems.title: Public-sector jobs have risen by 327,000 positions so far in 2023, according to the Bureau of Labor Statistics, a number approaching one-fifth of all new U.S. jobs created in the period.
feedItems.description: Public-sector jobs have risen by 327,000 positions so far in 2023, according to the Bureau of Labor Statistics, a number approaching one-fifth of all new U.S. jobs created in the period.

feedItems.title: Instacart said it set a price of $30 a share for its initial public offering, at the high end of expectations, in a further sign of resurgence in the IPO market.
feedItems.description: Instacart said it set a price of $30 a share for its initial public offering, at the high end of expectations, in a further sign of resurgence in the IPO market.

feedItems.title: Five Americans who had been wrongly imprisoned in Iran were on their way home after the U.S. released billions of dollars in revenue from Iranian energy sales that had been frozen under sanctions, senior U.S. officials said.
feedItems.description: Five Americans who had been wrongly imprisoned in Iran were on their way home after the U.S. released billions of dollars in revenue from Iranian energy sales that had been frozen under sanctions, senior U.S. officials said.
